data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I worked really hard this week at my job and at school. I ____ really ____, ____ can't ____ enough ____. I ____ to ____ a ____ yesterday, but ____ was ____ much ____ in ____ house. When I'm tired I act mean, so I hope I can rest tonight!
data.partBlankContent: I worked really hard this week at my job and at school. I fe__ really ti___, a__ can't g__ enough sl___. I tr___ to ta__ a n__ yesterday, but th___ was t__ much no___ in m_ house. When I'm tired I act mean, so I hope I can rest tonight!
data.fullContent: I worked really hard this week at my job and at school. I felt really tired, and can't get enough sleep. I tried to take a nap yesterday, but there was too much noise in my house. When I'm tired I act mean, so I hope I can rest tonight!
data.answer: 我这周工作和学习都很努力。我觉得很累，而且睡眠不足。昨天我想睡个午觉，但我家太吵了。当我累了的时候，我会表现得很刻薄，所以我希望我今晚能休息一下!
